org.netbeans.lib.v8debug.connection

Class ClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.lib.v8debug.connection.ClientConnection

  • public final class ClientConnection
extends Object
    A debugger client connection. This is a main client debugger class. Create an instance of this class to connect to a local or remote debugger.

    The typical usage is: 

    
   final ClientConnection connection = new ClientConnection(hostName, portNumber);
   new Thread() {
       void run() {
           connection.runEventLoop(new ClientConnection.Listener() {
               public void header(Map properties) {
                   // header received
               }
               public void response(V8Response response) {
                   // response received
               }
               public void event(V8Event event) {
                   // event received
               }
           });
       }
   }.start();
   ...
   V8Request request = Continue.createRequest(...);
   connection.send(request);

      static interface  ClientConnection.Listener

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientConnection

        public ClientConnection(String serverName,
                        int serverPort)
                 throws IOException
        Create a new client connection.
        Parameters:
        serverName - the debugger server name. Can be null to connect to localhost.
        serverPort - the debugger server port
        Throws:
        IOException - when an IO problem occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • runEventLoop

        public void runEventLoop(ClientConnection.Listener listener)
                  throws IOException
        Execute the debugger events loop. Run this in an application thread, this class does not provide any threading. This method blocks until the connection is closed and distributes the debugger events through the provided listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to receive the debugger events.
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown when an IO problem occurs.

      • send

        public void send(V8Request request)
          throws IOException
        Send a request to the debugger server. The implementation synchronizes the requests, no additional synchronization is necessary.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to be sent to the debugger server.
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown when an IO problem occurs.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close the connection.
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown when an IO problem occurs.

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Test whether the connection is closed.
        Returns:
        true when the connection is already closed, false otherwise.

      • addIOListener

        public void addIOListener(IOListener iol)
        Add an I/O listener to monitor the debugger communication.
        Parameters:
        iol - an IOListener

      • removeIOListener

        public void removeIOListener(IOListener iol)
        Remove an I/O listener monitoring the communication.
        Parameters:
        iol - an IOListener
